title: Rap Artist Afroman Sued by Officers Who Raided His Home
description: On Monday, March 13, 2023, seven law enforcement officers filed suit against Afroman, accusing the rap artist of improperly using footage from a police raid on his Ohio home last year in his music videos.
content:
WINCHESTER, Ohio (AP) Seven law enforcement officers have sued rap artist Afroman, accusing him of improperly using footage from a police raid on his Ohio home last year in his music videos.
